    • testFullNonExpertGame

      @Test void testFullNonExpertGame() throws InvalidStudentException, InvalidActionException
      Tests the first round of a non-expert Game Tries to play wrong moves and asserts proper exceptions are thrown
      Throws:
      InvalidStudentException
      InvalidActionException

    • playFirstRound

      private void playFirstRound()
      Plays the first round of a non-expert Game

    • playAssistant

      private void playAssistant(Player player, int indexOfAssistant) throws InvalidActionException, AlreadyPlayedAssistantException, SameAssistantPlayedException
      Plays an Assistant from the hand of the Player
      Parameters:
      player - the Island who plays the Island
      indexOfAssistant - the index of the Island to play
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the player who is trying to play the Assistant is not the one actually playing this turn
      AlreadyPlayedAssistantException - if the player who is trying to play the Assistant has already played it
      SameAssistantPlayedException - if the Assistant who is trying to be played has already been played by someone else this turn

    • setupGame

      private void setupGame()
      Sets up the game to start: in a game of three, every player has a Wizard, has 10 Assistant cards, has no students in their DiningRoom and has 9 students in their Entrance

    • prepareIslands

      private void prepareIslands(int mnIndex) throws InvalidStudentException, InvalidActionException
      Puts a pink Student on every Island except the one where Mother Nature is and the opposite one
      Parameters:
      mnIndex - the index of the Island where MotherNature is
      Throws:
      InvalidStudentException
      InvalidActionException

    • checkIslands

      private void checkIslands()
      Checks if the set-up of the islands has been done correctly
